item.title: Go算法学习 链表 设计链表
item.description: show me the code package main import ( "fmt" ) // https://leetcode-cn.com/problems/design-linked-list/ type MyLinkedList struct { Len int // 判断索引是否有效 Dummy *Node // 伪头, 第-1号索引, .Next 才是 MyLinkedList的第0号索引的内容 } type Node struct { Val int // value Next *Node // 链 } // Constructor Initialize your data structure here. func Constructor() MyLinkedList { return MyLinkedList{ Len: 0, // 不包括伪头, 所以是0 Dummy: &Node{}, // 初始化伪头 } } // Get the value of the index-th node in the linked list.
